lead_paragraph: When Stephen Curry pulls out his mouth guard and lets it fly in the very way he shoots from anywhere on the court, you know the MVP is really mad.

headline.main: Curry Leads the Way in Warriors' 51st Straight Home Win
headline.print_headline: Curry Leads the Way in Warriors' 51st Straight Home Win

snippet: When Stephen Curry pulls out his mouth guard and lets it fly in the very way he shoots from anywhere on the court, you know the MVP is really mad....
